Name: Zombie Slayer
About the game: [h]Zombie Slayer[/h] Zombie Slayer is an immersive first person shooter where you survive against endless waves of zombies. Team up with friends or survive alone to try and reach new records! The waves get harder as you go, so how long can you last? Kill zombies, earn points, buy weapons, unlock new rooms, and survive! This game currently includes 2 unique maps and 16+ weapons. Map 1: Outpost Map 2: Fortress Weapons Key Features Zombie Slayer VR is in it's earliest stages of Alpha, meaning many changes are expected to come. This includes: In the next update, we plan on adding some buildable objects and melee weapons. However, in the future we will add: - New maps - Gun customization - New guns - Extra abilities - Zombie bosses - Easter eggs - Bug fixes
